lines.code: long long x1 , x2 , y1 , y2 = 2 ;

lines.text: read x1 , x2 , y1 and y2
print maximum between abs of x2 - x1 and abs of y2 - y1 and a newline
lines.code: cout << max ( abs ( x2 - x1 ) , abs ( y2 - y1 ) ) << " \n " ;
